Disposable Paper Plates There are a wide variety of different plates available that vary in size, the way they are formed, and the materials used to create the texture of the plate. 3 different sizes are available 1) 6" (15.24cm), 2) 7" (17.78cm) and 3) 9" (22.86cm) with pack of 100, 200, 500 & 1000pcs Versatile use of Paper Plates Made from various paper-based materials, paper plates are manufactured to be used for casual dinners, picnics, and any events where the plate is to be discarded This disposable paper plates perfect for serving up food at BBQs, Buffets, Parties Despite being made out of trees, paper plates are better for the environment than plastic plates Disposable Paper Plates For All Occasions and Parties 6" Paper Plates 7" Paper Plates 9" Paper Plates Size 6" (15.24cm) Size 7" (17.78cm) Size 9" (22.86cm) Material Paper Material Paper Material Paper Paper GSM 250 gsm Paper GSM 250 gsm Paper GSM 250 gsm Pack Size 100 Plates per pack Pack Size 100 Plates per pack Pack Size 100 Plates per pack Brand HOT BARGAINS Brand HOT BARGAINS Brand HOT BARGAINS Disposable Paper Plates Disposable Paper Plates Hygiene Proof Sealed Pack Disposable paper plates can be microwaved or placed in the freezer, also can be use for both cold and hot food, strong and durable plates perfect for everyday use, perfect alternative to plastic plates, NO MORE DISHWASHER, Perfect for all kind Occasions and Parties
